name: Tanner
ability: EOA (end of age): draw 3 cards from the discard pile.  You may add one of them to demand.  Put the rest on the bottom of discards.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): Draw a card then discard.

name: Gatherer
ability: When discarding development cards, you may pay treasury 1 gold to add one to the demand pile.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): Draw a card then discard.

name: Wiseman
ability: You do not pay taxes.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): Draw a card then discard.

name: Mediator

effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): Draw a card then discard.

effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): Draw a card then discard.

ability: When opened: You may play an event as a free action.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): Draw a card then discard.

effect: Players providing the most science: draw a card and then you may discard a card.

effect: Treasury -1 gold for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

effect: Treasury -1 gold for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Orchard
ability: EOA (end of age): you may take an extra turn.
effect: Treasury -1 gold for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Tower
ability: EOA (end of age): pay this contract from the treasury.  \nYour draw limit is increased by 1.
effect: May play directly to demand pile.  \nIf there’s no other food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Armory
ability: On your turn, pay this contract from the treasury if it’s unpaid.  \nObsoleted by swords.
effect: May play directly to demand pile.  \nIf there’s no other food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Tavern
ability: EOA (end of age): If you provide more happiness than anyone, gain 2 gold.
effect: If contracted weapon count exceeds demand size: +1 population and treasury +4 gold.

name: Farm
ability: You may trigger one event per turn as a free action.
effect: Players gain 1 gold from the treasury per stone they provide.

name: Bank
ability: When the treasury runs out, gain 2 gold.
effect: Players gain 1 gold from the treasury per stone they provide.

name: Laboratory
ability: When you trigger an event (before it resolves), draw a card.  If it has science demand, reveal it and draw 1 more.
effect: Players gain 1 gold from the treasury per stone they provide.

name: Theater
ability: EOA (end of age): if contracted, gain 1 gold per bronze provided by players.
effect: Players providing the most science: draw a card for each science you provide.  Return all but one to the bottom of its draw pile.

name: Lumberyard
ability: On your turn, pay this contract from the treasury if it’s unpaid.  \nObsoletes clubs.
effect: Players providing the most science: draw a card for each science you provide.  Return all but one to the bottom of its draw pile.

name: Trade Post
ability: Each turn you may treat one food provision as any resource for contracting purposes.
effect: Players providing the most science: draw a card for each science you provide.  Return all but one to the bottom of its draw pile.

name: Fort
ability: To open, you must first discard a stone business and return its contract to the top of the demand.  \nObsoletes clubs.
effect: Treasury -2 gold for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Smelter
ability: When you play an event, examine it, then place it anywhere above the bottom event.  \nObsoletes clubs.
effect: Treasury -1 gold for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Temple
ability: When opened, draw a card.  \nYour draw limit is increased by 2.
effect: Treasury -2 gold for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Workshop
ability: If you would draw a card at the end of your turn, draw 2 instead.
effect: May play directly to demand pile.  \nIf there’s no other food in the demand pile, +1 population.

name: Raiders
ability: On your turn, pay this contract from the treasury if it’s unpaid.  \nObsoletes clubs.
effect: If contracted weapon count exceeds demand size: +1 population and treasury +6 gold.

name: Lounge
ability: When contracted, for each other business you have, gain 2 gold.
effect: If contracted weapon count exceeds demand size: +1 population and treasury +6 gold.

name: Dairy Farm
ability: Starting a business is a free action.
effect: Players gain 1 gold from the treasury per bronze they provide.

name: Insurance
ability: When opened, place 10g here.  When treasury runs out of money, pay 1 contract using this gold.
effect: Players gain 1 gold from the treasury per bronze they provide.

name: Library
ability: After starting a business, draw two cards then put one back.
effect: Players gain 1 gold from the treasury per bronze they provide.

name: Market
ability: When opened, gain 1 gold for each type of resource you provide.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): you may contract any business using the top card of the discard pile.

name: Importer
ability: When opened, add two cards of your choice from the discard pile to the demand pile.
effect: Each player gains 2 gold per science they provide.

name: Blacksmith
ability: On your turn, pay this contract from the treasury if it’s unpaid.  \nObsoletes spears and clubs.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): Draw 2 cards from the discard pile.

name: Cafe
ability: When opened, play one free action for every two food you provide (including these).
effect: Treasury -2 gold for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Monastery
ability: When drawing at the end of your turn, you may draw the bottom card of the demand pile.
effect: Treasury -2 gold for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Gravedigger
ability: When opened, draw any two cards from the discard pile without looking at their faces.
effect: Treasury -2 gold for each demand card in excess of contracted weapons.

name: Iron Mine
effect: Players gain 2 gold per food they provide.

name: Knighthood
ability: On your turn, pay this contract from the treasury if it’s unpaid.  \nObsoletes spears and clubs.
effect: If contracted weapon count exceeds demand size: +1 population and treasury +8g.

name: Jeweler
ability: EOA (end of age): earn 2 gold from a player providing less happiness.
effect: If contracted weapon count exceeds demand size: +1 population and treasury +8g.

name: Legion
ability: On your turn, pay this contract from the treasury if it’s unpaid.  \nObsoletes spears and clubs.
effect: Players gain 1 gold from the treasury per iron they provide.

name: Museum
ability: When a hide, stone, or bronze is placed in the demand pile, gain 2 gold.
effect: Open, uncontracted businesses earn their owner 2 gold each.

name: University
ability: When opened, return the development cards to your hand.
effect: Deal the top two cards from the discard pile onto the demand pile.
